overview: The Healers is a deconstructed reconstruction of a memory set in Rotterdamâ€™s mid-1990s nightlife. The party scene is presented in a triptych: the thrills of the night, the location, the date.  Layers that normally form a cinematographic entity by merging together are stripped bare and served separately. Eventually the pre-process of making the film becomes the film itself.
title: The Healers
